JobFullDesc: Partner Engineering is a highly technical team that works with our strategic partners to integrate Facebook products into their mobile platforms, apps, and devices. Our Mobile Partner Engineering team has managed the Facebook Preloads Program with our mobile partners on more than 1B Android devices and enabled various features & services from Facebook apps to mobile partner devices. Partner Engineers bring deep technical knowledge of Android platforms to lead highly visible initiatives and launch impactful products with our strategic mobile partners.You will engage with some of the world's most influential companies to drive Facebook family of apps' compatibility and quality on partner devices, and internally with our Product team to enhance those apps. The ideal candidate will combine technical and business skills to make our partners successful and improve Facebook app quality on their devices.Improve the quality of Facebook apps on our partners' latest Android devices by providing feedback to product team on gaps/bugs and fix them proactivelyContribute to assigned project/product and technology area on Android and industry/partnersProvide technical consultation to partners and delivers quality project/integration/partner engagements with direction from the manager or team after scopingUse broad range of technical and soft skills to build productive relationships with our partners, and resolve technical and business needsRespond and maintain effective communication with Android phone manufacturers and operator partners and internal stakeholdersDevelop and effectively manage relationships with external and internal partnersActively participates in creating a positive atmosphere amongst team and beyondUnderstand tools, concepts and processes related to Facebook family of apps, and underlying implementation across AndroidDocument and share learning within the team upon completion of projectsWillingness to travel approximately 10% of the timeMINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS2+ years of relevant industry experience - software engineering or partner engineeringB.A/B.S. or M.S. in Computer Science or equivalent degree or experienceExperience with Android development and using various SDKs and librariesSoftware development experience in languages and environments such as Java, NDK(C++) and/or PHPExperience working with Android operating systemPREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS2+ years of relevant industry experience - software engineering or partner engineeringB.A/B.S. or M.S. in Computer Science or equivalent degree or experienceExperience with Android development and using various SDKs and librariesSoftware development experience in languages and environments such as Java, NDK(C++) and/or PHPExperience working with Android operating systemFacebook's mission is to give people the power to build community and bring the world closer together. Through our family of apps and services, we're building a different kind of company that connects billions of people around the world, gives them ways to share what matters most to them, and helps bring people closer together. Whether we're creating new products or helping a small business expand its reach, people at Facebook are builders at heart. Our global teams are constantly iterating, solving problems, and working together to empower people around the world to build community and connect in meaningful ways. Together, we can help people build stronger communities - we're just getting started.
